title: What is a Computer Keyboard?
content: A keyboard is an input device used to type letters, numbers, and commands into the computer.

title: Types of Keys on the Keyboard
content:
The keyboard has different groups of keys:
  • Alphabet keys (A–Z)
  • Number keys (0–9)
  • Function keys (F1–F12)
  • Special keys (Enter, Shift, Spacebar, Ctrl, Alt, etc.)

title: What is a Computer Mouse?
content: A mouse is an input device that helps move the pointer and select things on the screen.

title: Basic Mouse Actions
content:
The mouse is used in different ways:
  • Single Click: Select an item.
  • Double Click: Open a file or folder.
  • Right Click: Open a shortcut menu.
  • Drag and Drop: Move objects around.

title: Introduction to Coding
content: Coding is giving instructions to a computer using special languages. Kids can start with fun coding blocks like Scratch or simple Python commands.
